Review: Approachable and motivating intro, but needs deeper explanations
Great way to get started with Deep Learning; a very practical and up-to-date (early 2018) guide from the creator of Keras
Clear and usable instructions and foundation
I purchased this book to gain a better understanding of Keras
Perfect book for those less interested in theories and concepts
Excellent book, marred by printing errors / faded pages
Good content minus poor publishing quality = 3 stars
Incredible well-written, well-articulated book on the topic of deep learning
